Dark Scythe.name: Dark Scythe
Dark Scythe.flavor: You call a dire weapon and grip its cold wood, feeling its merciless energy flowing through your hands.
Dark Scythe.effect: You transform a single weapon or implement in your hand into a dark scythe. It remains a dark scythe until the end of the encounter. Your weapon or implement retains all its traits, properties, and powers, and gains the following properties and powers.
Dark Scythe.property: When you reduce a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points using the dark scythe, you regain hit points as if you had spent a healing surge.
Dark Scythe.power(Encounter): Free Action. Trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack using the dark scythe. Effect: That enemy is weakened (save ends).
